create or replace PACKAGE lm_pty_tapi_pck
IS
-- Table API package for table lm_parties
-- Generated by VI TAPI generator version 6.2  (TAPI generated 03-Jan-2022  05:41:15)

-- Generated global constants

g_con_table_name  CONSTANT     VARCHAR2(61) := 'LM_PARTIES';
g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION pty_select_row( i_pty_ID   IN  lm_parties.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_pty   OUT lm_parties%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pty_select_row_uk1( i_pty_ID_CUST   IN  lm_parties.ID_CUST%TYPE
                           , i_pty_INSTANCE_ID   IN  lm_parties.INSTANCE_ID%TYPE
                           , o_rt_pty  OUT lm_parties%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                           , o_rt_pty  OUT lm_parties%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                           , o_rt_pty   OUT lm_parties%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pty_select_row_upd_uk1( i_pty_ID_CUST   IN  lm_parties.ID_CUST%TYPE
                               , i_pty_INSTANCE_ID   IN  lm_parties.INSTANCE_ID%TYPE
                               , o_rt_pty  OUT lm_parties%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pty_select_row_upd_uk2( i_pty_DESCRIPTION   IN  lm_parties.DESCRIPTION%TYPE
                               , o_rt_pty  OUT lm_parties%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

PROCEDURE pty_lock_row( i_pty_ID   IN  lm_parties.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE pty_lock_row_nowait( i_pty_ID   IN  lm_parties.ID%TYPE )
;

PROCEDURE pty_insert_row ( io_rt_pty  IN OUT lm_parties%ROWTYPE )
;

FUNCTION pty_update_row( i_pty_ID   IN     lm_parties.ID%TYPE
                       , io_rt_pty  IN OUT lm_parties%ROWTYPE )
RETURN NUMBER
;

FUNCTION pty_delete_row( i_pty_ID   IN  lm_parties.ID%TYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

FUNCTION pty_seq1_nextval
RETURN lm_parties.ID%TYPE
;


END lm_pty_tapi_pck;
/




package body lm_pty_tapi_pck
is




function pty_select_row( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type
                       , o_rt_pty   out lm_parties%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pty ( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_parties pty
            where pty.id = i_pty_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pty( i_pty_id => i_pty_id );
         fetch c_pty into o_rt_pty;
         l_found := c_pty%found;
         close c_pty;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pty%isopen
         then
            close c_pty;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pty_select_row;

function pty_select_row_uk1( i_pty_id_cust   in  lm_parties.id_cust%type
                           , i_pty_instance_id   in  lm_parties.instance_id%type
                           , o_rt_pty  out lm_parties%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pty ( i_pty_id_cust   in  lm_parties.id_cust%type
                   , i_pty_instance_id   in  lm_parties.instance_id%type )
      is
         select *
           from lm_parties pty
          where pty.id_cust = i_pty_id_cust 
            and ( pty.instance_id = i_pty_instance_id or (pty.instance_id is null  and i_pty_instance_id is null  ));
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pty(i_pty_id_cust => i_pty_id_cust, i_pty_instance_id => i_pty_instance_id);
         fetch c_pty into o_rt_pty;
         l_found := c_pty%found;
         close c_pty;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_pty%isopen
      then
         close c_pty;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pty_select_row_uk1;

function pty_select_row_uk2( i_pty_description   in  lm_parties.description%type
                           , o_rt_pty  out lm_parties%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_select_row_uk2';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pty ( i_pty_description   in  lm_parties.description%type )
      is
         select *
           from lm_parties pty
          where pty.description = i_pty_description ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pty(i_pty_description => i_pty_description);
         fetch c_pty into o_rt_pty;
         l_found := c_pty%found;
         close c_pty;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_pty%isopen
      then
         close c_pty;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pty_select_row_uk2;

function pty_select_row_upd( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type
                           , o_rt_pty   out lm_parties%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_pty ( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_parties pty
            where pty.id = i_pty_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_pty( i_pty_id => i_pty_id );
   fetch c_pty into o_rt_pty;
   l_found := c_pty%found;
   close c_pty;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_pty%isopen
      then
         close c_pty;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end pty_select_row_upd;

function pty_select_row_upd_uk1( i_pty_id_cust   in  lm_parties.id_cust%type
                               , i_pty_instance_id   in  lm_parties.instance_id%type
                               , o_rt_pty  out lm_parties%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := pty_select_row_uk1( i_pty_id_cust   =>  i_pty_id_cust
                                   , i_pty_instance_id   =>  i_pty_instance_id
                                   , o_rt_pty => o_rt_pty );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := pty_select_row_upd( i_pty_id => o_rt_pty.id
                                      , o_rt_pty => o_rt_pty );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end pty_select_row_upd_uk1;

function pty_select_row_upd_uk2( i_pty_description   in  lm_parties.description%type
                               , o_rt_pty  out lm_parties%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_select_row_upd_uk2';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := pty_select_row_uk2( i_pty_description   =>  i_pty_description
                                   , o_rt_pty => o_rt_pty );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := pty_select_row_upd( i_pty_id => o_rt_pty.id
                                      , o_rt_pty => o_rt_pty );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end pty_select_row_upd_uk2;

procedure pty_lock_row( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_pty ( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_parties pty
              where pty.id = i_pty_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_pty_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                pty_lock_row_nowait( i_pty_id => i_pty_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_pty( i_pty_id => i_pty_id );
                  close c_pty;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pty%isopen
         then
            close c_pty;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pty_lock_row;

procedure pty_lock_row_nowait( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pty ( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_parties pty
               where pty.id = i_pty_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_pty_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_pty( i_pty_id => i_pty_id );

            close c_pty;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_pty%isopen
        then
           close c_pty;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pty_lock_row_nowait;

function pty_perform_update( i_pty_id   in     lm_parties.id%type
                           , io_rt_pty  in out lm_parties%rowtype )
return number
;

function pty_perform_delete( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure pty_insert_row ( io_rt_pty  in out lm_parties%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_parties( id
                                , id_cust
                                , description
                                , instance_id )
              values ( io_rt_pty.id
                     , io_rt_pty.id_cust
                     , io_rt_pty.description
                     , io_rt_pty.instance_id )
           returning id
                   , id_cust
                   , description
                   , instance_id
                into io_rt_pty.id
                   , io_rt_pty.id_cust
                   , io_rt_pty.description
                   , io_rt_pty.instance_id;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pty.id||'"'
                                                             ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_pty.id_cust||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_pty.description||'"'
                                                             ||', INSTANCE_ID = "'||io_rt_pty.instance_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pty_insert_row;

function pty_perform_update( i_pty_id   in     lm_parties.id%type
                           , io_rt_pty  in out lm_parties%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_parties
            set id = io_rt_pty.id
              , id_cust = io_rt_pty.id_cust
              , description = io_rt_pty.description
              , instance_id = io_rt_pty.instance_id
          where id = i_pty_id
      returning id
              , id_cust
              , description
              , instance_id
           into io_rt_pty.id
              , io_rt_pty.id_cust
              , io_rt_pty.description
              , io_rt_pty.instance_id;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pty.id||'"'
                                                             ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_pty.id_cust||'"'
                                                             ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_pty.description||'"'
                                                             ||', INSTANCE_ID = "'||io_rt_pty.instance_id||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pty_perform_update;

function pty_perform_delete( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_parties
          where id = i_pty_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pty_perform_delete;

function pty_update_row( i_pty_id   in     lm_parties.id%type
                       , io_rt_pty  in out lm_parties%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         pty_lock_row( i_pty_id   =>  i_pty_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            pty_perform_update( i_pty_id   =>  i_pty_id
                              , io_rt_pty  => io_rt_pty );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pty.id||'"'
                                                          ||', ID_CUST = "'||io_rt_pty.id_cust||'"'
                                                          ||', DESCRIPTION = "'||io_rt_pty.description||'"'
                                                          ||', INSTANCE_ID = "'||io_rt_pty.instance_id||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end pty_update_row;

function pty_delete_row( i_pty_id   in  lm_parties.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         pty_lock_row( i_pty_id   =>  i_pty_id );

         
         l_deleted := pty_perform_delete( i_pty_id   =>  i_pty_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pty_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pty_delete_row;

function pty_seq1_nextval
return lm_parties.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pty_seq1_nextval';
   l_pty_id  lm_parties.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select lm_pty_seq1.nextval 
           into l_pty_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_pty_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pty_seq1_nextval;


end lm_pty_tapi_pck;
/
